cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DB 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it discusses the measurement of similarity between text segments or concepts, which is a key topic in information retrieval. It could also belong to the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category as it mentions text mining and question answering, which are both related to natural language processing. Additionally, the paper mentions ontology matching and text mining, which are both topics in Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also involves the use of a taxonomy, which could be related to Machine Learning (cs.LG) as well as Databases (cs.DB).
